Installing / Upgrading 
========================

MitreCVE is available on `PyPi <https://pypi.org/project/mitrecve/>`_ and only for python3.x

We recommend using ``pip3`` to install MitreCVE on all platforms:

.. code-block:: sh

    pip3 install mitrecve


To upgrade using pip : 

.. code-block:: sh

    python -m pip install --upgrade mitrecve
